memory.body: Discussed football facts, happened to be supporters of the same team. Come on you Gunners !
memory.author: KarlSaks

memory.body: Discovered that we both really like to listen to John Mayer's music, we made the whole office listen to his last album (of course volume was low)
memory.author: Karl

memory.body: The occasion indicates the gravity of the situation, however the conversation with Hanna was always soothing, and a joke or two are always present.
memory.author: Karl
